About Portfolio no.nonsense Words

Side projects by collaborating designers and developers

Originally called Team Josh, no.nonsense was started as an umbrella name for ongoing side projects between myself and Joshua Beckman. It has since grow to include a number of our friends:

Vaibhav Krishna
Kevin Lafin
Valentine Nesterov
Eleni Chappen

If you are interested in collaborating on any of our projects, or on any of yours, send me an email.

Projects

Some of our projects are active, some are dead, and some are still in progress. If you happen to enjoy any of them and would like to suggest improvements (or get a shirt/sticker) @us on Twitter.

  • Narro

    Convert articles to podcasts
    Beckman + Martin Learn more

  • Alleyooop

    Most popular Dribbble shots
    Beckman + Martin Learn more

  • Blackbox

    Limited edition artwork subscription
    Lafin + Martin In progress

  • Zephyr Podcast

    Annual discussion on SF/CHI tech scenes
    Krishna + Beckman Learn more

  • NBA3K

    NBA 2K Blog
    Martin + Kaspick In progress

  • twentyfive

    Compare your favorite movies
    Martin + Beckman In progress

  • Bbbench

    Bookmarking Dribbble artists
    Martin + Beckman Dead

About

My name is Josh Martin and and I'm a Chicago Designer focused on Branding and UI/UX. Learn more.

A detailed list of my work experience, endorsements, and proficiencies can be seen on my Linkedin and Resume.

I host my unabridged, visual portfolio on Dribbble and offer a brief, consolidated .pdf version for download.

For all other inquiries, I'm reachable via email.

@jawsmartin
